titles.title: A resolution to inform the Senate that a quorum of the House had assembled and had elected Jim Wright, a Representative from the State of Texas, Speaker, and Donnald K. Anderson, a citizen of the State of California, Clerk.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Informs the Senate that a quorum of the House of Representatives has assembled, that the Honorable Jim Wright, of Texas, has been elected Speaker, and that Donnald K. Anderson has been elected Clerk.
